about_the_game:
Echo's Climb is a challenging adventure platformer. You'll explore a kingdom frozen in stone, ascend the various locales and collect echoes of the past, all to hopefully return these lands to their former glory.

  • Explore an interconnected world
  • Conquer challenging jumping puzzles
  • Meet peculiar and interesting characters

Since this is an alpha demo it only has a few areas fleshed out, The Lava Lakes and The Undergrowth are very early prototypes.

Demo Features
  • 1h+ of gameplay
  • 13 collectables to find hidden throughout the world
  • 1 Intricate Jumping Puzzle
  • Built-in speed run features
